descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...one color of blocks on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is one block tall and the same amount of blocks wide as the number of colored blocks in the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...color the whole output grid the color of the colored input grid blocks so there is a horizontal line of colored blocks

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a grid with one color squares and black squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...be a horizontal line with the number of colored squares.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make the squares the same color as the colored squares.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...one colored box and few black box
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...only two box
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...fill only the colored one
